segments.text: I want to check in now . Here is my ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you have any luggage to check in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a seat preference ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like an aisle seat . I feel terrible near the window .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is your boarding pass . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S2
